tool_description: Parses X.509 certificates from various formats (PEM, DER, PKCS#7) and extracts key certificate fields including subject, issuer, validity dates, extensions, and public key information.

certificate_data.description: Raw certificate data in PEM, DER (base64), or PKCS#7 format

format.description: Certificate format: PEM, DER, or PKCS7

error_messages: Invalid certificate format: Ensure certificate_data is properly formatted PEM, DER, or PKCS#7.
Unsupported format: Format must be one of [PEM, DER, PKCS7].
Malformed certificate data: Certificate data appears to be corrupted or incomplete.
usage: Provide certificate_data as a string and optionally specify format. Returns parsed certificate information including all standard X.509 fields.
